aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Executor runtime credentials for Polymarket trading
Researcher runtime credentials for Claude and PolymarketData

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.alarmDescription: Triggers researcher task after executor performs many actions
Triggers when executor logs an execution failure

securityGroupEgress.description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

Fn::Join:
#!/bin/bash
dnf update -y
dnf install -y docker awscli
systemctl enable docker
systemctl start docker
REGION=

:latest
aws ecr get-login-password --region $REGION | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.$REGION.amazonaws.com
docker pull $IMAGE_URI
docker rm -f polyautomate-executor || true
SECRET_JSON=$(aws secretsmanager get-secret-value --region $REGION --secret-id

--query SecretString --output text)
POLYMARKET_API_KEY=$(printf '%s' "$SECRET_JSON" | python3 -c 'import json,sys; print(json.load(sys.stdin).get("POLYMARKET_API_KEY", ""))')
POLYMARKET_PASSPHRASE=$(printf '%s' "$SECRET_JSON" | python3 -c 'import json,sys; print(json.load(sys.stdin).get("POLYMARKET_PASSPHRASE", ""))')
POLYMARKET_SIGNING_KEY=$(printf '%s' "$SECRET_JSON" | python3 -c 'import json,sys; print(json.load(sys.stdin).get("POLYMARKET_SIGNING_KEY", ""))')
docker run -d --name polyautomate-executor --restart unless-stopped -e EXECUTOR_MODE=live -e POLYMARKET_API_KEY="$POLYMARKET_API_KEY" -e POLYMARKET_PASSPHRASE="$POLYMARKET_PASSPHRASE" -e POLYMARKET_SIGNING_KEY="$POLYMARKET_SIGNING_KEY" --log-driver=awslogs --log-opt awslogs-region=$REGION --log-opt awslogs-group=

securityGroupEgress.description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Daily strategy validation and tuning run
Run researcher task when executor action threshold is crossed
